entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0001.70] The member CompetitiveContractedRenewablePortfolioMember is used on the axis ConsolidationItemsAxis. The ConsolidationItemsAxis should only be used with the members defined in the US GAAP taxonomy or the following extension members: OtherOperatingSegmentsAndIntersegmentEliminationsMember, OperatingSegmentsAfterReconcilingItemsAndEliminationsMember, OperatingSegmentsExcludingIntersegmentEliminationMember, CorporateAndReconcilingItemsMember, CorporateReconcilingItemsAndEliminationsMember, OperatingSegmentsAndCorporateNonSegmentMember, EliminationsAndReconcilingItemsMember, CorporateAndEliminationsMember. There are no facts associated with this member and axis.
